I’m Sherri Mitchell. A Ruby on Rails developer and professional problem solver.

I'm available and ready to work. Let's talk!

What I Do

Software Engineering

Let's work together to build your vision. I have a strong technical background as well as the analytical ability to help define and understand the problem that needs to be solved and design an appropriate technical solution.

Front-End Development

Front-end aesthetics as well as the needs of the customer are always top of mind. I have a keen eye for detail combined with the knowledge and understanding of good UX design. I am focused on utilzing these principles toward designing beautiful, responsive sites.

Strong Analysis Skills

Effective problem solving requires the ability to understand a customer's needs. I have an extensive analysis background, and the ability to effectively facilitate problem definition. I also have the knowledge and experience to help guide your project to success.
